column4: hello!! please i need help i cant install any software i dont know whats wrong!! http://paste.ubuntu.com/293460/
try sudo dpkg --configure -a
oh my didn't read the top I'm sorry
thats what i get when i do that
yea I just noticed sorry, give me a second
quite weird i dont know whats wrong
no idea yet?
no :( never seen that error but I'm looking
its saying something that it cant read the file of status...
have you tried to replace your current status with status-old
fearful... nope how do i do that?
!who
sudo mv /var/lib/dpkg/status-old /var/lib/dpkg/status
wait, backup ur current one too
sudo cp -b /var/lib/dpkg/status /var/lib/dpkg/status-current
nothing happened
well the cp one won't but did it work after you mv the status-old?
!who | appleman_
you can try also sudo apt-get install -f to check if theres anything weird in your packages
!hi | Black_Rose
ive already tried that, didnt work either
I seriously have no idea I've never ever seen that problem :S
